mapper.select: select bookno from book where username = #{username}
select u.username,u.userlevel from users u where username = #{username}

select r.gradename,count(*)-(select count(*) from roombooking rb where rb.checkin < TO_DATE(#{from}, 'MM/DD/YYYY') and rb.checkout > to_date(#{to},'MM/DD/YYYY')) as reservableOrNot,rp.breakfastprice,rp.gradeprice from room r join roomprice rp on r.roomno = rp.roomno GROUP BY r.gradename, rp.breakfastprice, rp.gradeprice
mapper.insert: insert into dinner select b.bookno,b.totalcount,150000 from book b where username=#{username} and b.bookno=#{bookno} and b.bookstatus = '체크인대기' order by 1 desc FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY0
insert into dinner select b.bookno,b.totalcount,120000 from book b where b.username = #{username} and b.bookno = #{resno} and rownum =1 order by 1 desc
mapper.select: select b.bookno from book b where username = #{username} and bookdate = to_date(#{bookdate},'MM/DD/YYYY')
select b.bookno,b.username from book b where b.username = #{username} and b.booktel = #{booktel} and b.booker = #{booker} and b.bookstatus = '체크인대기'
select rb.checkin,rb.checkout,bk.booker,bk.booktel,rb.bookroomgrade from roombooking rb ,book bk where rb.bookno = bk.bookno and username = #{username}

select u.name,u.tel from users u where username = #{name}
